metaTitle: ALEGRA XXV Torrevieja | From €245,000 | New Build Apartments
metaDescription: Discover ALEGRA XXV in Centro Torrevieja. Modern 2-3 bed apartments from €245,000. Developer ALEGRIA. Completed July 2027. Investment with 8% growth potential.

content.heroIntro: ALEGRA XXV represents a distinctive opportunity in Torrevieja's vibrant Centro district, delivered by the trusted developer ALEGRIA. This carefully designed residential project features 3 exclusive units offering 2-3 bedroom apartments ranging from 90 to 128m² of contemporary living space, priced from €245,000. Located in the heart of Torrevieja's most sought-after neighborhood, ALEGRA XXV combines modern architectural design with practical family living, scheduled for completion on July 1st, 2027. The development captures the essence of Mediterranean living while maintaining accessibility to the region's finest amenities, including world-class healthcare, pristine beaches, and renowned golf courses. With property values in Torrevieja appreciating at 8% year-on-year and rental potential reaching €650 per week, ALEGRA XXV offers both lifestyle benefits and solid investment fundamentals. ALEGRIA's commitment to quality construction and sustainable design ensures your new home meets the highest European standards.

locationSection.intro: Centro Torrevieja is the pulsing heart of this dynamic Costa Blanca destination, offering the perfect blend of cosmopolitan convenience and Mediterranean charm. This prestigious neighborhood attracts a diverse community of residents who value proximity to world-class amenities, pristine beaches, and authentic Spanish culture. The Centro district is characterized by its vibrant atmosphere, excellent dining establishments, and comprehensive services that cater to modern living. Home to Spain's largest expat community where English is widely spoken everywhere, Centro Torrevieja provides an instantly welcoming environment for international buyers. The area's strategic location ensures quick access to major attractions while maintaining the peaceful, residential character essential for a quality lifestyle. Property values here command premium positioning due to the exceptional infrastructure, including Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja's 24-hour public services, Blue Flag beaches within minutes, and world-class golf courses at your doorstep.
highlights: Beach: Playa del Cura Blue Flag - 2km (pristine Mediterranean)
Hospital: Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja - 24hr Public - 3km
Shopping: Mercadona, Carrefour, Lidl multiple locations within 1-2km
Restaurants: Over 200 dining options including Spanish, Italian, British cuisine within 2km

propertyFeatures.intro: ALEGRA XXV exemplifies contemporary European construction standards, combining aesthetic appeal with functional excellence. Each residence is meticulously crafted by ALEGRIA using premium materials and innovative building techniques that prioritize comfort, durability, and energy efficiency. The development reflects a sophisticated understanding of modern living requirements, incorporating features that enhance daily life while maintaining environmental responsibility. Every detail, from thermal insulation to interior finishes, has been carefully selected to ensure lasting value and resident satisfaction. The construction methodology adheres to rigorous Spanish building codes and incorporates sustainable practices that reduce long-term operating costs.
features: Private communal swimming pool with sun terraces
Fully fitted kitchens with premium appliances
Double glazing with thermal break technology
Quality ceramic and porcelain flooring throughout
Contemporary bathroom fixtures with rainfall showers

content.investmentSection: ALEGRA XXV represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamically appreciating property markets. Torrevieja's property values have demonstrated consistent 8% year-on-year growth, significantly outperforming broader European trends. The development's Centro location, combined with proven rental demand averaging €650 weekly for comparable properties, positions units as both personal retreats and income-generating assets. Remarkably, prices at ALEGRA XXV remain 45% below comparable properties on Costa Blanca's northern coast, offering exceptional value. The area's demographic profile—featuring Spain's largest expat population with widespread English fluency—creates sustained demand from international buyers seeking Mediterranean lifestyle investments. Strong tourism infrastructure, including excellent airport connectivity and world-class amenities, supports robust rental market fundamentals. ALEGRIA's established reputation and professional development standards ensure asset protection and long-term appreciation potential.
whyBuySection: Prime Centro Torrevieja location with walkable access to authentic Spanish culture
Trusted developer ALEGRIA with proven track record in Costa Blanca residential projects

Villamartín Championship Golf Course just 15 minutes away

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in ALEGRA XXV?
faqs.answer: From €245,000. ALEGRA XXV offers 2-3 bedroom apartments ranging from 90-128m². Three exclusive units are currently available. Contact our sales team via WhatsApp for detailed pricing on specific floor plans and immediate availability.

faqs.question: When will ALEGRA XXV be completed?
faqs.answer: July 1st, 2027. ALEGRIA guarantees completion on this date with structured payment milestones. The developer provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Specific delivery schedules and payment plans are available upon request.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of ALEGRA XXV?
faqs.answer: ALEGRIA is the developer—an established residential construction company with extensive experience building quality homes throughout Torrevieja and the Costa Blanca region. They maintain high standards of craftsmanship, sustainability, and customer service.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Torrevieja offers Spain's largest expat community with English widely spoken everywhere, making it ideal for international buyers. Property values show consistent 8% year-on-year appreciation. Outstanding amenities include Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja's 24-hour public healthcare, Playa del Cura Blue Flag beach, and four championship golf courses within 20 minutes. The area combines Mediterranean lifestyle with practical modern infrastructure.

faqs.question: How far is ALEGRA XXV from the beach?
faqs.answer: Approximately 2 kilometers to Playa del Cura, one of Torrevieja's most prestigious Blue Flag beaches. La Mata's 6km golden sand beach is also easily accessible. Los Locos and Los Náufragos beaches offer alternative options within 3-5 kilometers.

faqs.question: What amenities are near ALEGRA XXV?
faqs.answer: Extensive amenities surround the development: Mercadona and Carrefour supermarkets (1-2km), Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja public healthcare (3km), Villamartín Championship Golf Course (15 minutes), El Limonar International School (British curriculum), and over 200 restaurants within 2km offering Spanish, Mediterranean, and international cuisine.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja safe to live in?
faqs.answer: Yes. Torrevieja maintains good safety standards with visible police presence and modern security infrastructure. The Centro district attracts long-term resident expat families who have established thriving communities. Neighborhoods feature gated residential developments and video security systems like those at ALEGRA XXV.

faqs.question: What is Torrevieja known for?
faqs.answer: Torrevieja is renowned for its pristine Blue Flag beaches, world-class golf courses (Villamartín, Las Ramblas, Campoamor, La Finca), vibrant expat community, Mediterranean lifestyle, and excellent property investment opportunities. The town offers authentic Spanish culture combined with international amenities and infrastructure.

faqs.question: What are the rental potential for properties at ALEGRA XXV?
faqs.answer: Comparable 2-3 bedroom apartments in Centro Torrevieja achieve €650 weekly rental rates. Annual gross rental income reaches approximately €33,800. Strong tourism infrastructure, proximity to beaches, and international demand from holiday let operators create consistent rental market demand year-round.

content.conclusion: ALEGRA XXV represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a premium Mediterranean home in Torrevieja's most coveted Centro location. With modern 2-3 bedroom apartments starting from €245,000—45% below Costa Blanca North pricing—the development delivers both lifestyle excellence and genuine investment potential. ALEGRIA's commitment to quality construction, combined with Torrevieja's proven 8% annual property appreciation and strong rental fundamentals, positions these units as smart financial decisions. The area's thriving expat community, world-class amenities including Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja and Playa del Cura Blue Flag beach, and proximity to championship golf courses create an enviable Mediterranean lifestyle. Whether seeking a personal Mediterranean retreat, investment property, or rental income asset, ALEGRA XXV offers compelling value. Contact our sales team via WhatsApp today to arrange a private viewing, discuss available floor plans, and explore flexible payment options. Your Costa Blanca dream awaits.
